template: [{level}] Alert: {issue} detected on Node {nodeId}. Immediate action required.

placeholders.level: The severity of the alert (e.g., Info, Warning, Critical).
placeholders.issue: The specific issue or event that triggered the alert.
placeholders.nodeId: The ID of the node where the issue occurred (if applicable).

examples: [Critical] Alert: High CPU usage detected on Node Node-12. Immediate action required.
[Warning] Alert: Node Node-5 is experiencing slow response times.
[Info] Alert: Routine maintenance scheduled for Node Node-8.
